https://tmrev.io/movie/75308-Derren Brown: The System 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3OTMelC4oXV3JqFX6aKBka8e7o3.jpg ‘The System’ was based around the idea that a system could be developed to 'guarantee a winner' of horse races. Cameras followed a member of the public, Khadisha, as Brown anonymously sent her correct predictions of five races in a row, before encouraging her to place as much money as she could on the sixth race. Derren Brown: The System
